unnormalised: Arre bhai, that sabzi mandi in Dadar? Bargain karo toh you can get tomatoes for ₹20/kg, otherwise they quote Rs. 35! And don't forget to check your change; those vendors sometimes give back less than ₹10.
normalised: Arre bhai, that sabzi mandi in Dadar? Bargain karo toh you can get tomatoes for rupee twenty per kilogram, otherwise they quote rupees thirty five! And don't forget to check your change; those vendors sometimes give back less than rupee ten.
